name: @web-tech/monorepo
description: A template fullstack repo for the RWTH WebTech Course
author: Manuel Frohn

scripts.dev-db:init: docker run -d --name web-tech-dev-db -v postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=dev-pw -p 9001:5432 postgres:latest && psql -h localhost -d postgres -U postgres -p 9001 -a -q -f ./packages/backend/src/core/db/initDb.sql
scripts.dev-db:re-init: npm run dev-db:stop && docker rm web-tech-dev-db && npm run dev-db:init
